page.title: 20Local History - Modern Times
page.content: Denny has a long history of visiting royalty.{Robert Bruce}met the patriot {Wallace}at Dunipace Church after Falkirk 1298.{Black Douglas,}the warrior who fought with Bruce and who later took the heart of the king into battle, was said to have been born in {Herbertshire Castle}in Denny. In 1745 {Bonnie Prince Charlie}stayed at the {Mansion of Primrose of Dunipace}the night before the battle of{Falkirk. Primrose lost his estates and was executed for entertaining the Prince. {Princess Anne,}a Patron of {Strathcarron Hospice}has made several visits, on one such visit on 29.5.85 HRH opened the new extension to its facilities.{Prince Charles and {Princess Diana}were greeted by Brian McNeil, a former dux of our school when on their Italian Tour.
